comments.name: Ranjeet
comments.comment: I ran into a similar issue a while back, and this worked for Angular 4. Hopefully, you can use it too. This is in app.component.ts

comments.name: Munna
comments.comment: I ran into a similar issue a while back, and this worked for Angular 4. Hopefully, you can use it too. This is in app.component.ts

description: Dividers can be added to lists as a means of separating content into distinct sections. Inset dividers can also be added to provide the appearance of distinct elements in a list without cluttering content like avatar images or icons. Make sure to avoid adding an inset divider to the last element in a list, because it will overlap with the section divider.

description: Dividers can be added to lists as a means of separating content into distinct sections. Inset dividers can also be added to provide the appearance of distinct elements in a list without cluttering content like avatar images or icons. Make sure to avoid adding an inset divider to the last element in a list, because it will overlap with the section divider.
